comment:
This special new make is clear as filtered water and semi-thin semi-watery legs decorate the glass interior.

The nose is sweet, grainy, with notes of baking yeast, corn dust, mixed berries, chocolate, and ethanol.

The palate has a watery mouthfeel; the taste is sweet, clean, hiding a Twizzler candy note.

The finish is soft and mildly lingering.
Aroma is sweet and similar to Tequila. Corn and sweet barley.
Exclusive to tastings at the Makers Mark Distillery.
Unaged. Very "Yeasty" taste, but not overpowering.
